pageContext.claim: “They wonder why their polls are off you know. We've interviewed 253 people, they oversample Democrats by 28%. Trump is down five. I'd say, yeah, but you're interviewing mostly Democrats, did you ever see that? I guess there must be a legal reason why they have to put it, but they oversample by 18%, 20%, 21%, oh, how about last election?”
pageContext.analysis: This is a Trumpian fantasy. Certainly, 2016 pollsters from swing states had some reflection to do — and adjustments have been made for 2020 — but no respectable poll is conducted in the way that Trump describes.
